name: @qavajs/demo
description: demo repository that demonstrates framework capabilities

scripts.build: npm run build-steps-config-loader && npm run build-steps-wdio
scripts.build-steps-config-loader: npm install --prefix node_modules/@qavajs/steps-config-loader&& tsc --project node_modules/@qavajs/steps-config-loader && npm uninstall @cucumber/cucumber --prefix node_modules/@qavajs/steps-config-loader
scripts.build-steps-wdio: npm install --prefix node_modules/@qavajs/steps-wdio && tsc --project node_modules/@qavajs/steps-wdio && npm uninstall @cucumber/cucumber --prefix node_modules/@qavajs/steps-wdio
